00013 // return functors
00014 
00015 // set EAX to smth, return to smth
00016 template<typename T>
00017 class retfunc {
00018 protected:
00019         REGISTERS *R;
00020         DWORD retAddr;
00021 public:
00022         retfunc(REGISTERS *r, DWORD addr) : R(r), retAddr(addr) {};
00023         int operator()( T Result ) {
00024                 R->EAX(Result);
00025                 return retAddr;
00026         }
00027 };
00028 
00029 // set EAX to smth, return to fixed
00030 template<typename T>
00031 class retfunc_fixed : public retfunc<T> {
00032 protected:
00033         T Result;
00034 public:
00035         retfunc_fixed(REGISTERS *r, DWORD addr, T res) : retfunc<T>(r, addr), Result(res) {};
00036         int operator()() {
00037                 this->R->EAX(Result);
00038                 return this->retAddr;
00039         }
00040 };
00041 
00042 // return to one of two fixed
00043 class retfunc_bool : public retfunc<int> {
00044 protected:
00045         DWORD negAddr;
00046 public:
00047         retfunc_bool(REGISTERS *r, DWORD yAddr, DWORD nAddr) : retfunc<int>(r, yAddr), negAddr(nAddr) {};
00048         int operator()(bool choose) {
00049                 return choose ? retAddr : negAddr;
00050         }
00051 };

00053 // invalid pointers
00054 
00055 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00056 void AnnounceInvalidPointerMap(hash_map<T1, T2> &map, void *ptr) {
00057         typename hash_map<T1, T2>::iterator ix;
00058         ix = map.find(reinterpret_cast<T1>(ptr));
00059         if(ix != map.end()) {
00060                 map.erase(ix);
00061         }
00062 
00063         for(ix = map.begin(); ix != map.end(); ++ix) {
00064                 if(ptr == ((void *)(ix->second))) {
00065                         map.erase(ix->first);
00066                 }
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 template<typename T1>
00071 void AnnounceInvalidPointer(T1 elem, void *ptr) {
00072         if(ptr == (void *)elem) {
00073                 elem = NULL;
00074         }
00075 }

00078 // vroom vroom
00079 // Westwood uses if(((1 << HouseClass::ArrayIndex) & TechnoClass::DisplayProductionToHouses) != 0) and other bitfields like this (esp. in CellClass, omg optimized). helper wrapper just because
00080 template <typename T>
00081 class IndexBitfield {
00082         public:
00083         DWORD data;
00084         IndexBitfield(const DWORD defVal = 0) : data(defVal) {};
00085 
00086         bool Contains(const T obj) const {
00087                 return (this->data & (1 << obj->ArrayIndex)) != 0;
00088         }
00089         void Add(const T obj) {
00090                 this->data |= (1 << obj->ArrayIndex);
00091         }
00092         void Remove(const T obj) {
00093                 this->data &= ~(1 << obj->ArrayIndex);
00094         }
00095         void Clear() {
00096                 this->data = 0;
00097         }
00098 };

00100 #include <AbstractClass.h>
00101 template <typename T>
00102 inline T specific_cast(AbstractClass * Object) {
00103         if(Object->WhatAmI() == CompoundT<T>::BaseT::AbsID) {
00104                 return reinterpret_cast<T>(Object);
00105         }
00106         return NULL;
00107 };
00108 
00109 template <typename T>
00110 inline T generic_cast(AbstractClass * Object) {
00111         if((Object->AbstractFlags & CompoundT<T>::BaseT::AbsDerivateID) != 0) {
00112                 return reinterpret_cast<T>(Object);
00113         }
00114         return NULL;
00115 };
